import { useEffect } from "react" import { useAuthorize } from "../../helpers/hooks/useAuthorize" import { Header } from "../index" const CreateRoadMaps = () => { const isAuthorized = useAuthorize("admin/createemailtemplates") useEffect(() => { const isTabActive = () => !document.hidden }, [isTabActive]) console.log(isTabActive()) return ( isAuthorized && ( <>
RoadMap
US (on hover full name, on click a card with details)
  • Set up a meeting
  • Meet with Usman
    • ) ) } export default CreateRoadMaps
